str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Worthy, worthy of, deserving, comparable, suitable. Probably from ago; deserving, comparable or suitable.
A blow, stripe, wound; an affliction, plague. From plesso; a stroke; by implication, a wound; figuratively, a calamity.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To flay, flog, scourge, beat. A primary verb; properly, to flay, i.e. to scourge, or to thrash.
Puny; especially neuter somewhat.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
Much, many; often.
Much, many; often.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
And, even, also, namely.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From para and tithemi; to place alongside, i.e. Present; by implication, to deposit.
Much, many; often.
From peri; superabundant or superior; by implication, excessive; adverbially violently; neuter preeminence.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.
